channel.title: MIL:SRG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MIL:SRG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Italy’s Snam Plans to Delay Open Grid Europe Deal, Sole Says
item.description: Snam SpA’s purchase of a stake in German gas network operator Open Grid Europe from Abu Dhabi’s Infinity Investments is unlikely to close this month as planned, Il Sole 24 Ore reported.
